text: Special arrangements have been made for recording the bio metric data of people for issue of Aadhaar cards at all taluk offices in the district, the municipal offices of Thuvakudi, Thuraiyur and Manapparai and the Srirangam, K.Abishekapuram, Ariyamangalam and Golden Rock zonal offices of the Tiruchi Corporation. The camps would be held from 9 a.m. on all days, including holidays. Those who have not recorded their bio metric data so far, can utilise the opportunity now and extend their cooperation for cent per cent coverage.
title: Camp for issue of Aadhaar cards
